description: I always include at least three elements in my grain bowls: the grains, the topping and something to garnish the topping, usually a protein, often a poached egg I wanted some contrasting crunch as well as some cheese, so I made Parmesan crisps, also known as frico, one of the easiest, best-kept secrets in the Italian repertoire.
title: Brown Rice Bowls With Stewed Peppers
title_page: Brown Rice Bowls With Stewed Peppers Recipe - NYT Cooking
text:
I always include at least three elements in my grain bowls: the grains, the topping and something to garnish the topping, usually a protein, often a poached egg. I wanted some contrasting crunch as well as some cheese, so I made Parmesan crisps, also known as frico, one of the easiest, best-kept secrets in the Italian repertoire.
Featured in: A Stew Of Peppers Dresses Up Brown Rice.
